verses.text: “\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w hold|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w assembly|strong="H4744"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*. \w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w sound|strong="H8643"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H8643"\w*.

\w together|strong="H8147"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* grain \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*—\w three-tenths|strong="H7969"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H4503"\w* ephah \f + \fr 29:3 \ft Three-tenths of an ephah is approximately 6 dry quarts or 6.6 liters (probably about 7.6 pounds or 3.5 kilograms of flour); also in verses 9 and 14.\f* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two-tenths|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H4503"\w* ephah \f + \fr 29:3 \ft Two-tenths of an ephah is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters (probably about 5.1 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of flour); also in verses 9 and 14.\f* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* ram,

\w and|strong="H7651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H6241"\w* an ephah \f + \fr 29:4 \ft A tenth of an ephah is approximately 2 dry quarts or 2.2 liters (probably about 2.6 pounds or 1.2 kilograms of flour); also in verses 10 and 15.\f* with \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H6241"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*.

\w Include|strong="H5921"\w* one \w male|strong="H8163"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w as|strong="H2403"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* addition \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w monthly|strong="H2320"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w daily|strong="H8548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w prescribed|strong="H4941"\w* \w grain|strong="H8548"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing \w aroma|strong="H7381"\w*, \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
